summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6107 for the improvement of 12th Avenue Northwest from West 92nd Street to West 100th Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 84334, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
